io.github.kushnirvladyslav

Class ScheduleEventPublisher

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.github.kushnirvladyslav.EventPublisher
      • io.github.kushnirvladyslav.ScheduleEventPublisher
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AutoCloseable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    DelayedEventPublisher, PeriodicEventPublisher

    public abstract class ScheduleEventPublisher
extends EventPublisher
    Abstract base class for event publishers that use ScheduledExecutorService. Provides shared timeUnit field for subclasses and handles scheduler shutdown.

    Subclasses must initialize the scheduler field in their constructor. The scheduler should never be null or changed during the object's lifetime.

    Note: This class performs immediate shutdown via shutdownNow(). Responsibility for graceful task completion lies with the scheduler users.

    Since:
    2025-06-11
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Vladyslav Kushnir
    See Also:
    EventPublisher, ScheduledExecutorService

      • shutdown

        public void shutdown()
        Shuts down this publisher and its ScheduledExecutorService. Performs immediate shutdown of the scheduler using shutdownNow().
        Specified by:
        shutdown in class EventPublisher
        Throws:
        IllegalStateException - if the scheduler was not properly initialized
        IllegalStateException - if this publisher is already shut down
